revision.text:
{{Infobox Military Structure | name=Bartın Naval Base
Bartın Deniz Üssü | partof= | location= [[Bartın]] | coordinates= {{coord|41.68250|N|32.23822|E|display=inline, title}} | image= {{Location map+|Turkey|width=300|float=center |caption=Location of Bartın Naval Base |places= {{Location map~|Turkey|lat=41.68250|long=32.23822|position = right |label=Bartın NB|label_size=80|marksize=6}} }} | caption= | type= Military base | code= | built= | builder= | materials= | height= | used= 1965 - present | demolished= | condition= | ownership= | controlledby= [[Turkish Navy]] | garrison= | commanders= | occupants= | battles= | events= }} {{Turkish Navy}} '''Bartın Naval Base''' ({{lang-tr|Bartın Deniz Üssü}}) is a [[submarine base]] of the [[Turkish Navy]] on the southern coast of the [[Black Sea]] in [[Bartın Province]] north of [[Turkey]]. The base is assigned to the Turkish Northern Sea Area Command. It is located {{convert|9.8|km|mi|abbr=on}} west by north-west of [[Bartın]]. The [[submarine pen]], adjacent to the [[Port of Bartın]], was built between 1960 and 1965 by the [[Turkish Construction and Contracting Industry|Turkish construction]] company [[STFA Group|STFA]] to give underground shelter to the Black Sea submarine flotilla.{{cite web|url=http://www.santiyeciler.com/Yapilar/Detay.aspx?YapiNo=21 |publisher=Şantiyeciler |title=Bartın Limanı ve Denizaltı Sığınakları |language=Turkish |accessdate=2009-09-05 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20090131183906/http://santiyeciler.com:80/Yapilar/Detay.aspx?YapiNo=21 |archivedate=2009-01-31 |df= }} == References == {{reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bartin Naval Base}} [[Category:Turkish Navy bases]] [[Category:Economy of Bartın]] [[Category:Military in Bartın]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in Bartın Province]]
